topics.body:
Done with the Cell Saga. (Pretty great.)

What happened while I was gone?
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
... I believe I'm going insane

So I went to a store just now, and I left the lights on at my home. 
I locked the doors and I remember leaving the lights on... I pause my movie and left.

So I got back and everything is normal, I unlock the doors, but my room light always turns off whenever I leave.
THIS ALWAYS HAPPENS, everything else is the same
topics.author: 51a2815b7f123be59500049b

topics.body:
And like it happens even when I leave my room for one minute 


It must be the shadows of the metro stations
